modName: For Whom the Drum Beats - DELETED
summary: Rescue a daring merchant\'s daughter, battle assassins from Hammerfell, and uncover an ancient magic artifact and its unique power, and explore a new dungeon!
descriptionHtml:
Not yet completed!  Work in Progress!!!

If this looks interesting to you, please hit the Track button so you\'ll know when the next version is up!  If you don\'t mind playing halfway through and giving me any feedback, that would be very helpful :)  When I began making this, my ideas were too grandiose for my modding ability, but now maybe I can finally finish this thing.

[color=#ffff99][size=+1][b]Features:[/b][/size][/color]
- A short quest about a kidnapping, a group of rogue assassins, and a powerful magical item.
- 4 primary NPCs, several supporting NPCs
- A medium-sized dungeon, fully Navmeshed and optimized
- Total Play Time:  about 25 - 30 minutes minimum

[color=#99ccff][b]Starting the Quest:[/b][/color]
Travel to the Bannered Mare in Whiterun to find a distraught young lady named Jenna.

[color=#99ccff][b]Along the way:[/b][/color]
Choose CAREfully from the dialogue options.  The wrong choice could immediately fail the quest!
Travel to a radiant location to find an item.  The location will be different for each playthrough and could be any dungeon, small or large, vanilla or mod, as long as it has the keyword \"NordRuin\" and a boss chest.
Explore a new dungeon, fully hand-Navmeshed and optimized, with enemies and loot.

NOTE:  After retrieving the item, that\'s as far as you can really go in the quest so far.  This mod has been on hold for a while as I worked on other mods and learned more scripting.  Now I\'m going to finally try and finish it.  Next version (1.5) will hopefully be finished and bug-free (wishful thinking though that may be!)

[color=#ffff99][size=+1][b]Compatibility:[/b][/size][/color]
The only possible conflicts this mod should have are location.  I added a house on the outskirts of Whiterun, and a tomb entrance northeast of Windhelm.
Does NOT conflict with Nernies Cities Expansion mod.

[color=#ffff99][size=+1][b]Voice Credits (in order of appearance):[/b][/size][/color]
Jenna - Anduniel (me)
Faranor - Elijah Lucian
Samira - Anduniel
Red Dirks - Elijah Lucian
Jasmina - Anduniel

Please take a look at my other, complete quest mod, [b][color=#ffff99][url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25977]Loves Labors Avenged[/url][/color][/b]

[color=#ffff99][size=+1][b]My other Voice Work:[/size][/b][/color]
I\'m available!  Contact me renharp @ yahoo.com
[color=#66ccff][b][url=http://annaincharacter.webs.com/]Anna In Character[/url][/b][/color] - my voice acting site with audio

[url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29175]Anduniel - Custom-voiced, Quest-aware Companion[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8429]Interesting NPCs[/url] - Joselyn (adult),    [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7BTSPSKNvMQ]Amalee[/url], [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=soFb7Yi1PvI]Gwyvane[/url], [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6-VqLY-7Rmk]Isobel[/url], [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qPUE8fLdCFg]Tikrid[/url], Anja, [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nCUz9dAn5X8]Henna & Frenna[/url], [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hiRjYO8Pis8]Aldi & Camaron[/url]
